description: Naraku`s ninth and final detachment, meant to replace Kagura. His main purpose is to observe InuYasha and Mouryoumaru`s growing powers and report back to Naraku. He has an incredible power to create illusions, but has many other powers as well: he can possess people with paper soldiers, summon vines to entrap his enemies, teleport others to different dimensions, detach organs from his body, and erect barriers. He travels on a giant origami paper crane.
name: Byakuya
